alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 12 at 2:01AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHERN NORTHUMBERLAND... SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING...MONTOUR...COLUMBIA AND SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 230 AM EST... At 157 AM EST, Doppler radar showed strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Dushore to Hughesville to Montoursville to Northumberland. Movement was east at 60 MPH. A recent wind gust to 50 MPH was recorded at Williamsport Regional Airport. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bloomsburg, Berwick, Milton, Mount Carmel, Danville, Northumberland, Elysburg, Riverside, Catawissa, Mifflinville, Lightstreet, Almedia, Montandon, Fernville, Mechanicsville, Buckhorn, Aristes, Numidia, Wilburton Number One and Jerseytown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan
